updateNotes: Jan 20 2026: GPU prices dropped significantly - H100 $2.29, H200 $2.50, B200 $3.49. Added Llama 4 Behemoth, DeepSeek V4, Mistral 3 Large.

f5ImpactFactors.methodologyReference: Util_Boost = Base × KV_Cache × Workload × Disagg × Ratio × GPU_Gen × Model
f5ImpactFactors.description: F5 DPU impact factors connected to the methodology formula

storageIntegration.announcement: NVIDIA CES 2026 - Inference Context Memory Storage Platform (ICMS)

confidenceLevels.verified: Official vendor pricing or published list price
confidenceLevels.estimated: Industry analyst reports, benchmarks, or calculated from similar products
confidenceLevels.speculative: Rough estimates based on market positioning - use with caution

pricingMetadata.disclaimer: IMPORTANT: Storage pricing varies significantly by configuration, volume, and negotiated enterprise discounts. Speculative values are rough estimates for planning purposes only. CONTACT VENDORS FOR ACTUAL PRICING QUOTES.

storageIntegration.description: NVIDIA BlueField-4 powers the Inference Context Memory Storage Platform, a new class of AI-native storage infrastructure for gigascale inference. Provides 5x higher tokens-per-second, 5x better power efficiency, and 20-40% reduction in time-to-first-token.

icmsPerformance.memoryTier: G3.5 (between GPU HBM and general storage)
